TextLibrary.Text: Winter
The Queen has sent you some help. I have a stone with a blessing upon it. It should keep the Undead away for a while. Long enough, I hope...
The Queen has sent you some help. I have a stone with a blessing upon it. It should keep the Undead away for a while. Long enough, I hope...
The Queen has sent you some help. I have a stone with a blessing upon it. It should keep the Undead away for a while. Long enough, I hope...
The Queen has sent you some help. I have a stone with a blessing upon it. It should keep the Undead away for a while. Long enough, I hope...
Long enough for what?
Long enough for what?
Long enough for what?
Long enough for what?
Long enough for me to stop the Undead at their source.
Long enough for me to stop the Undead at their source.
Long enough for me to stop the Undead at their source.
Long enough for me to stop the Undead at their source.
Let me come with you, two-legs. You have been a friend to my pack; now I would return that favor.
Let me come with you, two-legs. You have been a friend to my pack; now I would return that favor.
Let me come with you, two-legs. You have been a friend to my pack; now I would return that favor.
Let me come with you, two-legs. You have been a friend to my pack; now I would return that favor.
You're welcome, Winter. I could use the help...
You're welcome, Winter. I could use the help...
You're welcome, Winter. I could use the help...
You're welcome, Winter. I could use the help...
